pullrequest.title: Add extra gazebo libraries to config.cmake and pkg_config

content.raw: Totally agree with making sure nothing breaks. I'm waiting for Jenkins. To be able to run integration tests (in a different project) starting a gazebo server, loading a world, and checking some expectations is really powerful. I consider it a first class use case because is really useful.

To be able to run integration tests (in a different project) starting a gazebo server, loading a world, and checking some expectations is really powerful.
